short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Creating a more culturally-sensitive online experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Caption Catch helps to create a more culturally-inclusive online experience by removing bias and hateful language from social media platforms. Currently only for Reddit browsing, the extension transforms insensitive words on your page with a more culturally appropriate alternative. The extension explains why the word was replaced and offers educational links to learn more about suitable alternative words to use.
